generalInfo: Whether Cape Town has been on your travel list for some time, or you are considering the city on a whim, the thriving metropolis is a must-visit destination for families that are wishing for an entertaining and immersive getaway. From the towering mountain ranges to the pristine beaches and lush green landscapes that are filled with wildlife, this tailor-made tour is geared towards giving you the ultimate holiday experience. Discover the many marvelous facets of the global hotspot on this 14-day family-friendly trip to Cape Town’s most coveted attractions and thrilling activities.

dayInfo.title: Cape Town - Welcome to the Waterfront
dayInfo.description: Upon your arrival at Cape Town International Airport, the city’s thriving travel hub, you will meet your private transfer. Sit back in complete comfort and take in the scenic settings as you make your way to the V&A Waterfront. As you approach the V&A, which is a luxurious destination made famous for its vibrant energy and elegant design, you will bask in some of Cape Town’s most significant attractions. Table Mountain will stand mightily tall amongst the clouds, overlooking the entire city and waterfront, and stretches of the beautiful beach will sit snugly against the shoreline. First-class yachts, chartering the South Atlantic Ocean, will cruise into the port. After check-in, you will be taken to your suite, which you may call home for the following few nights. You can spend the evening exploring the waterfront’s many activities and attractions. Enjoy a Ferris wheel ride with your family for sweeping views of the city, shop for high-end fashion at the grand mall, capture magnificent images of Table Mountain in all its glory, and round off the night with platters of seafood at Cape Town’s most coveted sushi restaurant.

dayInfo.title: Cape Town - Award-Winning Entertainment
dayInfo.description: Today, you will rise to the serene sounds of seagulls soaring the sky, and waves gently breaking against the harbor walls. You will feel entirely rested after a relaxing night on the waterfront. You may then set off to Green Point’s leading family-friendly market, which will be a short drive from your hotel. The environmentally conscious, community-driven farmers market is dedicated to serving visitors the most authentic take on South African urban farming and culture. Here, spirits will run high, and you will enjoy stunning seaside views as you discover local, hand-crafted goods and eat wholesome cuisine. You will find a comfortable spot to spend the morning or meet like-minded families and travelers who are delighting in the astounding farmers market at the communal tables. You may transfer from the market to Africa’s largest aquarium for a mid-morning discovery of the ocean’s wonderful sea life. Said to be one of the best in the world, this award-winning aquarium offers an entertaining and insightful look into the diverse oceanic habitats. With interactive displays and tactile experiences, this visit will keep you and your family thoroughly engaged.

dayInfo.title: Cape Town - The City’s Striking Sights
dayInfo.description: At this point of the trip, you will be well familiar with the waterfront area and ready to explore more of Cape Town’s distinct destinations. In the morning, you and your family will transfer around the city in search of its most appealing attractions. You will visit its historical museum and captivating planetarium. On this trip, you will learn more about the country’s culture and heritage as you journey through the eye-catching displays of traditional South Africa. You will then enter the popular planetarium for an immersive and riveting trip into space. Sit amongst the stars, shoot past asteroids, and gaze into the cosmos as you experience a mesmerizing, galactic show. From here, you will visit the nearby gardens to relax and unwind. You and your family will laze around with the squirrels and birds as they eagerly approach you in search of a snack. With packets of nuts and seeds in hand, you can feed the friendly animals while you bask in the rays of the African sun. Then, you will transfer to the base of Table Mountain and await your very own Cable Car. You and your family will hop on board and be whisked away into the sky as you climb to the top of the mountain. Once you arrive at the top, you will encounter a 360-degree view of the city and surrounding landscape.

dayInfo.title: Stellenbosch - Picking Strawberries in Stellenbosch
dayInfo.description: A trip to Stellenbosch is an absolute must and will be a great retreat from the bustling city for a few nights. You will transfer to the immaculate green lands of Stellenbosch. This spectacular destination retains its Dutch colonial influence, which will be highlighted by its charming old-world architecture and design. Here, the days will pass by slowly, and the abundance of nature and wildlife around you will replenish and refresh your minds and bodies. You will check into your lodge, and may then spend the afternoon at an enchanting strawberry farm in Stellenbosch. You can capture precious moments of your family picking their first strawberries and load your baskets with the gorgeous red fruits. With tractor rides, pony rides, and mini-golf to name a few things to do, there is an assortment of activities to entertain everyone. As your fruitful day comes to an end, you will transfer to one of Stellenbosch’s premier restaurants.

dayInfo.title: Stellenbosch - Wine Tour of the Elite Estates
dayInfo.description: Famous for its world-class wine, a trip to Stellenbosch will not be complete without an in-depth tour of its elite estates. On day five, you will transfer to the Spice Route and more leading wine farms for an unforgettable day of delectable tasting. You will be exposed to the exceptional vintages and blends at each of the top-tier estates alongside impeccable views of the surrounding vineyard landscapes. As you sip each divine wine, your taste guide will impart insightful knowledge that pertains to the bottles and the estate’s unique winemaking process. Each tasting will be paired with a splendid charcuterie spread and/or cheese platter. The farms are family-friendly and will offer activities for the young ones to participate in as you watch over them. The Spice Route is home to a boutique chocolate tasting experience in which your children will take delight.

dayInfo.title: Cape Town - The Beach on Horseback
dayInfo.description: After the splendid getaway in Stellenbosch, you will return to the greater Cape Town area and check-in at a guesthouse in the coastal suburb of Noordhoek. The laid-back location overlooks the far-reaching Noordhoek Beach. Its breathtaking stretch of white sand will invite you to endearing walks along the coastline. Later today, you may traverse the shoreline on horseback and picnic under the sun. You will spend the afternoon at leisure, visiting artisanal bakeries, and superb coffee roasters. Finally, a Mediterranean meal in a homely, yet fine-dining barn-style, restaurant will bring the day to a perfect close.

dayInfo.title: Cape Town - Cape Town’s Beautiful Birdlife
dayInfo.description: Today, you will travel to Hout Bay along the famous winding Chapman’s Peak route. Along the trip, you will further discern Cape Town’s supreme beauty as you traverse the rugged mountain and witness immaculate ocean views. As you dip down into the Hout Bay valley, you will discover picture-perfect photo opportunities and capture them at the various lookout points. In Hout Bay, you will have the chance to experience fresh South African seafood dishes that have been caught the same day. Then, you will journey to the city’s largest bird wildlife sanctuary. At this tropical haven, you and your family will get as close as ever to the birds, mammals, and reptiles. The impressive conservation site boasts a collection of the most beautiful, multi-colored birds and creatures. As they fly up to you and chirp or soar overhead, you will feel one with nature on this delightful tour.

dayInfo.title: Cape Town - A Day with the Penguins
dayInfo.description: On the eighth day of your trip, you will visit the quaint South Peninsula suburb of Simon’s Town. Colonies of penguins flock to Boulders Beach and will waddle their way around the shores as you set yourselves up comfortably near the shady rocks. Here, you and your family will swim alongside the African penguins and soak up the sun as you capture lifelong memories together. Before the day is through, you will travel to one of Cape Town’s most recognized fish and chips restaurants for a truly authentic and traditional South African meal.

dayInfo.title: Cape Town - The Cape of Good Hope
dayInfo.description: The remarkable landscape setting and scenic drive to the Cape of Good Hope will offer some of the most picturesque sights and views that you will experience around the city. After breakfast, you will venture out to explore this point where the two oceans meet. The landmark destination truly captures the essence of the Western Cape’s beauty. The diverse natural habitat in its purest form and the ebbing and flowing of waves that crash into the magnificent mountain range will be incredibly inspiring to witness. You and your family will return home with stories of Cape Town’s awe-inspiring lookout point.

dayInfo.title: Cape Town - Blue Flag Beaches Await
dayInfo.description: Today, you will wake up with a reignited passion for the wonderful wildlife around you and relish in a gourmet breakfast before journeying to Cape Town’s premier beaches. The pristine Blue Flag certified beaches are the best in their class, giving you and your family the opportunity to unwind in style as you discover paradise. From crystal-clear waters to paper white sands and rugged rocky cliffs for climbing, a day of exploring the coveted beaches of Cape Town will provide thrills for the children and time to relax for you and your partner. In the evening, you will visit a gourmet restaurant with immaculate ocean views. Fine-dine and enjoy elegant cocktails as you witness the surreal African sunset over the sea.

dayInfo.title: Karoo - Sunset Safari
dayInfo.description: The following two days of your trip will be dedicated to discovering South Africa’s diverse wildlife. From your hotel, you will transfer to a safari lodge at a leading game reserve that is a few hours from Cape Town. Here, in the pristine Karoo region, you will explore African authenticity with a stunning backdrop of the striking mountain ranges. Upon arrival, you will be welcomed to your room with serene views of the landscape. You and your family will delight in a luxurious spa treatment before journeying into the wild for a unique Sunset Safari. On this stirring game drive, you will get the opportunity to spot the Big Five of Africa. If you miss one or two of the mighty creatures, then the following day will be spent ticking them off your travel list. You can return later today to the lodges for divine dining and family-friendly activities.

dayInfo.title: Karoo - The Big 5
dayInfo.description: With a full day to explore, you will set off early in the morning after breakfast. This time, you and your family will hop on quad bikes and experience nature along the roads less traveled. Guided by experienced rangers, you will encounter wondrous wildlife up close. Afterward, you will return to your rooms and have the mid-morning to lounge around the pool. Later today, you will depart from the lodges on a riveting Afternoon Safari. Your tour guide will share insightful knowledge about the wildlife and surrounding Karoo region. At this point, you should be able to mark off all of the Big 5 and have photo evidence to take back home. In the evening, you will return to your rooms before delighting in exquisite meals that will be prepared by prestigious chefs.

dayInfo.title: Cape Town - One Last Magical Night
dayInfo.description: Today, you will transfer back to Cape Town content in knowing that you have experienced all that the beautiful Western Cape has to offer. You will arrive at the hotel where you spent your first few nights on the V&A Waterfront. Familiar with this area, you will have the day to explore at your leisure. You can participate in any of the activities you wish or soak up the sun around the pool. In the evening, you will enjoy your final gourmet South African meal with sunset views to culminate the trip. You will have a comfortable night’s rest in preparation for your departure the following day.

dayInfo.title: Cape Town - Homebound
dayInfo.description: As saddening as it may be to be leaving this marvelous city, you will be ecstatic to have explored so much of it. With pictures and memories to commemorate your luxurious adventures and authentic tours, you will return home as thrilled as possible. You will enjoy one final, bountiful breakfast before making your way to Cape Town International Airport and departing for home.
